snippet: President Obama put partisanship aside for a few hours to pay tribute to his predecessor at the unveiling of George W. Bush’s official White House portrait.
abstract: Former Pres George W Bush returns to the White House for the unveiling of his official portrait; ceremony is attended by Pres Obama, who puts partisanship aside to pay tribute to his predecessor.
lead_paragraph: President Obama put partisanship aside for a few hours to pay tribute to his predecessor at the unveiling of George W. Bush’s official White House portrait.

headline.seo: Wisecracks in White House As Bush Portrait Is Unveiled
headline.main: Political Truce for a Portrait Unveiling
headline.print_headline: Wisecracks in White House As Bush Portrait Is Unveiled
